titleStmt.title: SII 7.45: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 45. (A.R. No. 42 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . Āyirattu Irunūṟṟu Aṟupattu Eṭṭiṉ vyayasaṁvaTsaraM cellāniṉṟatu sa
kalalokacakkaravatti śrīIrājanārāyaṇaṉ campuvarāyaṟkku yāṇṭu 9vatu mṛccikanāyaṟṟu
Aparapakṣattu pañcamiyum caṉikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa puṇarpūcattunāḷ jayaṅko
ṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Eyiṟkkoṭṭattu Eyilnāṭṭu Āṟpākkattu Āṟpākkiḻāṉ
peruṅkaruṇaiĀḷaṉ tiruveṅkaṭamuṭaiyāṉ kāliṅkarāyaṉeṉ Immaṇṭala
ttu kāliyūrkoṭṭattu viṟpeṭṭunāṭṭu Akaram cevaraṉmeṭāṉa naharī
śvaraccaturvvetimaṅkalattu vetādhyānaM paṇṇuvikkum Upātti
yāṉukku vetarvvittiyāka Ivvakarattu mahājaṉattiṉpakkal nāṉ ko
ṇṭu vedavirddhiĀka viṭṭa grahakṣettiraṅkaḷ Ivvūr naṭuvilteruvil kiḻciṟakil teṟ
kaṭaiya maṉai 7 1/2 nikki Itaṉ vaṭakku maṉai 1/2yum Ivvūr kiḻkaḻaṉi kīḻāṉa Akavatikku
kiḻakku coḻakulanārāyaṇavāykkālukku teṟkku kaṇṇāṟṟu nālām catirattu ki
piyāṉ Eṉṟu peyaruṭaiya 1/20vil muṉṉāḷ nāṉ Ivarkaḷpakkal pāṉiyavittikku ko
ṇṭu viṭṭa nilaṅkalantavāṟṟāl 1/40 nīkki vedaviruttiyāka nilaṅkalantavāṟṟālkoṇ
ṭa 1/40m Ivvāykkālukku vaṭakku 1l kaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟāmcatirattu muṭokki Eṉṟu peruṭai
ya 1/40 + 1/32m Ivvāykkālukku vaṭakku 2m kaṇṇāṟṟu 2m catirattu pittaṉkuṇṭil Eṉṟu peruṭaiya
1/40 + 1/4 + 1/20 ciṉṉam Itil muṉṉāḷ nāṉ Ivarkaḷpakkal pāṉiyavidthikku nilaṅkalantavāṟṟāl
koṇṭu viṭṭa 1/80 + 1/16 ciṉṉam nikki vetavirddhiyāka nilaṅkalantavāṟṟāl koṇṭa
+ 1/80 + 1/16 ciṉṉamum Ivvūrtteṟkil Āṟṟaṅkaraiyil talaiĪṭṭukkollaiyi
l muṉṉāḷ nāṉ Ivarkaḷpakkal pāniyavṛttikku koṇṭa kollai vaṭaceri mel
aruke kollai 1/40m Immaṉai 1/2m + 1/20 + 1/80 + 1/32 ciṉṉamum kollai 1/40m
Immahājaṉattiṉpakkalile koṇṭu Ivvakara
ttu vetāthyāṉam paṇṇuvikkum Upāttiyāṉukku ve
tavṛttiyāka cantirātittavaraiyum celluvatāka viṭṭeṉ Āṟppākkiḻāṉ peru
ṅkaruṇaiāḷaṉ tiruveṅkaṭamuṭaiyāṉ kāliṅkarāyaṉeṉ Ivai Āṟpākkiḻā
ṉ peruṅkaruṇai Āḷaṉ tiruveṅkaṭamuṭaiyāṉ kāliṅkarāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku
Ivai prāntūr śrīnaraciṅkapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai curacārampi ciṅkappirāṉ
paṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kāramppicceṭṭu ciraṅkanātapaṭṭasomāsi Eḻuttu Ippaṭi I⌈
vai Araṇaippuṟattu jaṉṉayapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kārampicceṭṭu praṇatāttika
rapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai ceṭṭai tāmotarapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu mahājaṉam paṇiyāl
Ūrkkaṇakku veḷḷarumpākkamuṭaiyāṉ kāmāṇṭai Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ikkoyilil poṟkoyil Ācāri Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.45 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
